title: Immobiliser Control Module - Diagnostic Trouble Codes

body.body: Immobiliser Control Module - Diagnostic Trouble Codes
Diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs) are logged in the immobiliser/TPMS control module memory when there is a confirmed fault in the system.
The codes are reported to the Triumph Diagnostic Tool as a four digit code.
The system will log the Diagnostic Trouble Codes listed below:

metadata.products: DVB; DX4; DW4; DWB; DBB; DUC; DUB; DTB; DZA; DA2; DB4; DT4; DU4; D34; DTC; DCZ; DPZ; DD4; D64; D54; DP4; DC4; D72; D92; DVY; DG4; DF4; DB2; DEX; DU3; DT3; DD2; DC3; DW; DVX; DF2; DF; DV; DC; DZ; DBX; DB; DE2; DE; DUY; DU
